description: Find an embassy, wave another flag in front of it.
name: These Damn Immigrants

description: Roll a wheel of cheese at least 10m.
name: Rollin' in it

description: Break a swiss law.
name: Öutlaw

description: Break an American law.
name: Outlaw

description: Find a restaurant that sells an entree costing 50 CHF or more.
name: Just Takin' a Look at the Menu

description: Complete scratch off lottery tickets until you win something.
name: Swiss Investor

description: Make a chemical weapon.
name: Geneva Convention

description: Find and consume a tiny little drink. (≤ 8 oz)
name: BIG HANDS

description: Buy a local paper and solve one of the puzzles.
name: Sign of The Times

description: Find and eat at the worst rated restaurant within a 1km radius.
name: The Worst Wurst

description: Find and visit the nearest church. Find a way to donate to this church.
name: Say Your Prayers

description: Mail home a postcard.
name: Hi, Mom!

description: Re-create a piece of American art.
name: What is this, a Crossover Episode?

description: Find printed media using this Swiss typeface.
name: Confoederatio Helvetica

description: Eat "American Food" from a restaurant.
name: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

description: Make a sandwich.
name: Un Bien

description: Buy something silly and wear it until the rest period or 3 hours, whichever is longer.
name: Fashion Statement

description: Find a statue and take a photograph mimicking it.
name: Stoned

description: Buy a Swiss army knife.
name: Swiss Army Knife

description: Create a Swiss army knife (At least 3 unique tools).
name: My Swiss Army Knife

description: Both teams have 10 minutes to find the oldest thing. You must be able to prove its age ±100 years.
name: Duel: Historian

description: Sketch a scene you are looking at, the better scene with more votes wins.
name: Duel: Sketchy Scene

description: Both teams have 10 minutes to get as high as possible. The higher team wins.
name: Duel: I have the high ground

description: Both teams have 10 minutes to build a cairn. The taller Cairn wins.
name: Duel: Ok Cairn

description: Play 8 ball!
name: Duel: Let's Play 8 Ball

description: Play Hangman.
name: Duel: Hangman

description: Estimate one minute; whoever is closer wins.
name: Duel: Swiss Clock

description: Compare your steps taken since the beginning of the day, whoever has the most steps wins.
name: Duel: Longest road

description: Eat a three course meal and write 1 paragraph reviewing it of at least 6 sentences to Google or Yelp.
name: Become a Michelin Critic

description: Pick up ten pieces of trash.
name: Community Service

description: Teams have 10 minutes to take as many pictures different Swiss flags as possible. The team with more pictures wins.
name: Duel: Now that's a big plus!

description: Make one of Switzerland's national dishes. Fondue, Rösti, or Raclette.
name: Ratatöuille

description: Find a spring or waterfall.
name: Evian

description: You must insist on tipping the next time you buy something.
name: Homesick

description: Find a QWERTZ keyboard.
name: Nice Kezboard

description: Find signage that contains 3 out of the 4 official languages of Switzerland (German, French, Italian, Romansh). This challenge can be started and completed in different cantons.
name: Polgylot

description: Touch the border of another country.
name: Leave

description: Guess the population of the town you're in. (no phone, ±20%)
name: Census

description: Wait 10 minutes. (no help, ±30 sec)
name: Internal Clock

description: Walk half a mile. (no help, no prep, ±0.05 miles)
name: Internal Pedometer

description: Find a town hall. (no phone)
name: GPS

description: Find an exact product that is 2x more expensive than on Amazon or a retail store in the US. No food or drink.
name: Foreign Tarrifs

description: Using a device that is not yours and an email that is not yours, send a threatening email to the other team.
name: Send an Anonymous Threat

description: If you are not on a train 10 mins after drawing this card, this card is vetoed.
name: Get on a Train Immediately

description: Between your team, do 100 squats or push-ups in Bern.
name: Feel the Bern

description: Bring at least 200ml of water from one water source to another.
name: Lake to Lake

description: Fill your water bottle from five different water sources.
name: Hydrate or Diedrate

description: Pray to a dam.
name: Goddam

description: Find a castle. Ride something and become a knight.
name: Get Knighted

description: Go ice skating.
name: On Ice

description: Find an animal that produces milk or eggs.
name: From the Source

description: Build a snowman.
name: Do You Wanna ... ?

description: Drink a beer out of an unusual vessel.
name: Das Boot

description: Make a charcuterie board complete with cheese, chocolate, and fruit all from Switzerland.
name: Local Date Night

description: Take an unusual mode of transportation. No train, bus, bike or car.
name: How Did We Get Here?

description: Acquire something gold and bury it.
name: Don't Trust Them Banks

description: Consume a liter of milk.
name: LOMAD

description: Trade some American currency for some foreign currency.
name: Cultural Exchange

description: One team member must wear a cowbell for at 3 hours or until the rest period, whichever is longer.
name: If You Liked it Then You Should Have Put a Bell on it

description: Ride on a rack and pinion railway.
name: Just a Cog in the Machine

description: Acquire and spend 8.85CHF with one of each coin.
name: Let me be Franc

description: Make some hot chocolate the European way.
name: Swiss Miss

description: Build and use a sundial.
name: Low Tech Swiss Clock

description: Create a swiss flag. (must have color)
name: Plus One

description: Go to a museum and spend at least 20 minutes there. Share three facts with the group that you learned there.
name: Class Trip

description: Find a chain restaurant that is also in the states. Buy an item on the menu that you can't find in the US.
name: Homesick 2

description: Un-swiss swiss cheese.
name: Swissn't

description: Find something older than the USA. (no phone)
name: Disprove Ron Swanson

description: Find a prison, police station, or college.
name: Go to Yale

description: Film a rocky training montage. The video must be at least 30 seconds.
name: Rocky

description: Sketch the street you are currently on, ala Paul Klee.
name: Art Kleek

description: Get on a boat.
name: I'm On a Boat

description: Take a photo of the matterhorn.
name: She....

description: Sneak a horse into your opponents bag.
name: Trojan Horse

description: Bring some milk to Lucerne from outside of the city's boundary.
name: Milkman's Milkman

description: Ride on a bike.
name: Bike

description: Eat some basil in basel.
name: Basil in Basel

description: Put your toes into the Aare, Switzerland's longest river.
name: Toes in the Aare

description: Do an olympic sport not including running.
name: Olympic Commissionee

description: Memorize and perform the Swiss National Anthem in English without a mistake.
name: Dubs not Subs

description: Learn and perform a specific swiss dance. Link: https://youtu.be/Qua0AVJ9PH4
name: Swiss Folk Dance

description: Both teams have 30 minutes to buy the most expensive singular chocolate.
name: Duel: Rich Tastes

description: Find and consume some Apple Schorle.
name: Schorle there is Apple

description: Complete Sunny's Trivia Corner.
name: Sunny's Trivia Corner

description: Get half a mile away from any building.
name: Isolationist

description: Generate a number between 1-20,000, you must visit a city with a population within 1000 of that.
name: Desolate 20

description: Visit 3 places whose names that end with -wil. (-wilen and -wieler are also acceptable)
name: Where There's a Wil There's a Way

description: Go to a town without a train station. It must be at least 5 miles from a train station.
name: Boo Hoo Choo Choo

description: Visit a cave.
name: Underground Scene

description: Find a city with exactly one bank, if its open, speak to the teller.
name: Banker? I hardly know her.

description: Find a clocktower.
name: Big Time

description: Find an old fortress.
name: Well, That's Useless

description: Visit a library and read aloud a children's book in another language to your partner.
name: Your Little Prince

description: Go to a family-owned business.
name: It Runs in the Family

description: Visit two Atlas Obscura locations at least 2 miles apart.
name: Obscuricist

description: Consume absinthe and play an instrument within 5 minutes of each other.
name: Absinthesizer

description: Throw a snack into your teammate's mouth from 5 feet away.
name: Baller

description: Make your own Jet d'Eau with your mouth.
name: Jet t'adore

description: Throw two small rocks at eachother until they collide at around the midpoint. Must be 10 feet apart.
name: Large Hadrock Collider

description: Make a map of the town, it must map most notable locations, including all banks, stores, and main roads.
name: Cartographer

description: Run a beer and pastry kilometer. You can mix and match and split the distance, but you must consume four items.
name: Beer Kilometer
